divs: Sighting DetailsMy name is Melissa Boone and I live in Irving, Texas. I'm 41 and stable. Last week I was outside, in the hot tub at the pool of my apartment, at about 9:30-9:45pm. I was relaxing and watching the sky and I saw a light in the sky about 2 fingers width s.w. of the moon. It was moving faster than an airplane but steady and moving "up". I was watching it and it wondering if it was an airplane up that high. Suddenly, it changed direction and was headed back the way it came and then, just shot out of view completely. I came back into the house and told my daughter that I thought I'd just seen a UFO. After seeing the ufo picture on coast to coast, I thought I'd just write in and tell what I saw. I don't know anything about astronomy.
Summary: light in the sky, moving in an unusual way
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Irving
There were no other sightings in Irving on or around June 15th 2006
